title: Aram Rerolls
body: Dunno if its just a bug or changes to aram but my rerolls went away after I rerolled 2 champs and someone dodged. got back to into champ select interface and my rerolls were gone. I'm not the only one that this has happened too.

replies.body: The player that dodged- were they in your premade group or were they a random player you were matched with? If they were in your premade and they dodged, you are meant to lose your rerolls.
